items.name: Ring of Khajiit
items.customDescription: Thieves everywhere will curse us both for the loss of this ring, my friend. So be it.

items.name: Ebony Blade
items.customDescription: I wonder if Mephala herself knows how many lives this foul blade has taken over the years? I will be glad to give the world a respite from it.

items.name: Mehrunes Razor
items.customDescription: You found my razor. Good. Can you feel its hunger? Can you feel its..Frustration? Now I will make it again what it once was, what it shall always be. Draw a line of blood across the land in the name of Mehrunes Dagon!

items.name: Daedric Crescent
items.customDescription: Probably the most rare and even outlawed item of all the great prizes is the Daedric Crescent Blade.

items.name: Volendrung
items.customDescription: Who now knows the tale of how this Dwemer hammer came to embody the power of one of their most bitter foes?

items.name: Cuirass of the Savior's Hide
items.customDescription: Legend has it that Hircine rewarded his peeled hide to the first and only mortal to have ever escaped his hunting grounds. This unknown mortal had the hide tailored into this magical Cuirass for his future adventures. The Savior's Hide has a tendency to travel from hero to hero as though it has a mind of its own.

items.name: Sigil Stone
items.customDescription: A Sigil Stone is the object that keeps Oblivion Gates open. They are found inside the Sigilium Sanguis, at the top of the largest tower, in the planes of Oblivion.

items.name: Dawnbreaker
items.customDescription: Mortals call it Dawnbreaker, for it was forged in a holy light that breaks upon my foes, burning away corruption and false life.

items.name: Azura's Star
items.customDescription: Ah, Azura's Star... as beautiful as all the tales tell.

items.name: Ebony Mail
items.customDescription: The Ebony Mail is an artifact created before recorded history, according to legend, by the Dark Elven goddess Boethiah. It is she who determines who should possess the Mail and for how long a time. If judged worthy, its power grants the wearer invulnerability to all common magical attacks that drain talents and health. It is Boethiah alone who determines when a person is ineligible to bear the Ebony Mail any longer, and the goddess can be very capricious...

items.name: Goldbrand
items.customDescription: This blade has slain many a hero over the years. Tamriel will be better off without it for a while.

items.name: Fearstruck
items.customDescription: Fearstruck was an artifact used by Lyrisius in his battle against the Akaviri invasion. It was a shield given to him by Boethiah, for reasons currently unknown. What is known of this shield, however, is that it was destroyed in a single breath by a wyrm (dragon), when fighting Lyrisius.

items.name: Umbra Sword
items.customDescription: Umbra is my blade. It is who I am. Who I was meant to be.

items.name: Masque of Clavicus Vile Sword
items.customDescription: Umbra is my blade. It is who I am. Who I was meant to be.

items.name: Oghma Infinium
items.customDescription: Not many could resist the temptation of the Oghma Infinium. Now it is my turn to be put to the test!

slayerAreas.name: Oblivion
slayerAreas.areaEffectDescription: Enemies are ${effectValue}% more resistant to damage.

attacks.name: Volendrung Slam
attacks.description: Volendrung dealings ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage and apply stun & life steal effect.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Volendrung dealings <damage> and apply a stun & lifesteal effect.

attacks.name: Meridia's Retribution
attacks.description: Dawnbreaker unleashes Meridia's Retribution dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage and apply a burn effect.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Dawnbreaker unleashes Meridia's Retribution dealing <damage> and apply a burn effect.

attacks.name: Meridia's Retribution
attacks.description: Meridia uses the true power of her retribution on you.

attacks.name: Queen of the Night Sky
attacks.description: Azura is Queen of the Night Sky.

attacks.name: Mother of the Rose
attacks.description: Azura is Mother of the Rose.

attacks.name: Tournament of Ten Bloods
attacks.description: Boethiah's realm often holds the Tournament of Ten Bloods.

pets.name: Adoring Fan
pets.customDescription: By Azura, by Azura, by Azura! It's the Grand Champion! I can't believe it's you! Standing here! Next to me!

pets.name: Haskill
pets.customDescription: You approach the Shivering Isles. Through the door behind me lies the realm of Sheogorath, Prince of Madness, Lord of the Never-There.
